footer.address: Address: Uzbekistan, Tashkent city, Chilanzar district, Obod neighborhood, Istiklol street, 23A.

integration.title: Work with us
integration.partner_text: Join our platform and reach thousands of customers.

questions.title: Frequently Asked Questions
questions.q1_title: How to order through the Fasgo app?
questions.q1_text: Download the app, register, choose a dish from the menu and click the "Order" button. We’ll take care of the rest!
questions.q2_text: Depending on your location and the restaurant’s load, delivery usually takes 30–45 minutes.
questions.q3_text: You can pay with any bank card or in cash to the courier.
questions.q4_title: What if the food doesn't arrive or there's a problem?
questions.q4_text: Contact customer support – we’ll quickly solve the issue or refund your money.
questions.q5_text: Fasgo offers thousands of dishes: national, fast food, vegetarian, Asian, European cuisines – new choices every day!

download.title:
Download the app and
start enjoying
download.text: Fasgo is a fast, reliable, and convenient food delivery service. Easily order your favorite dishes through our mobile app, and we’ll deliver them quickly to your door. Great taste – just one click away!

hero.title: Delivery from your favorite restaurants <1>fast</1>
hero.subtitle: National dishes, fast food, desserts, and drinks – all in one app!

wide_choice.title: Wide Selection
wide_choice.text: At <0>Fasgo</0>, there are thousands of dishes for every taste! From national plov to Italian pizza, Japanese sushi, or American burgers – all in <1>one place</1>. Lagman today, sushi tomorrow? The choice is yours! A new taste every day, every order – a delicious adventure!
